current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To extend the period during which Iraqis who were employed by the United States Government in Iraq may be granted special immigrant status and to temporarily increase the fee or surcharge for processing machine-readable nonimmigrant visas.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed
